meanings.definition: The quality or state of being streaky.
meanings.sent1: The artist admired the streakiness of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The streakiness of the marble gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent3: The streakiness of the cake frosting made it look like a zebra!
meanings.sent4: The streakiness of the sky at sunset resembled brushstrokes on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The streakiness of the fabric made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A tendency to occur in streaks or stripes.
meanings.sent1: The team's winning streakiness continued for the entire season.
meanings.sent2: The streakiness of the weather made it unpredictable.
meanings.sent3: His streakiness in finding four-leaf clovers amazed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The streakiness of luck seemed to follow her wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The streakiness of her performance earned her the title of the team's star player.

meanings.definition: The presence of streaks or lines in a pattern or design.
meanings.sent1: The streakiness in the wallpaper added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: The streakiness of the wood grain gave the table a rustic feel.
meanings.sent3: The streakiness in the carpet made it look like a runway for tiny ants.
meanings.sent4: The streakiness of the shadows created a dramatic effect in the photograph.
meanings.sent5: The streakiness of the paint strokes added depth to the artwork.
